Name: Black Strap
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
2 drop Hot pepper sauce (red vinegar-based e.g. Tabasco)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This drink benefits from the dilution, which comes with a lengthy stir.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2007 by Neyah White, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Strap contains 235 calories
